entry.tran: (政治)保守主义;保守党的政治主张
entry.def: Conservatism is a political philosophy which believes that if changes need to be made to society, they should be made gradually. You can also refer to the political beliefs of a conservative party in a particular country as Conservatism .
Conservatism is unwillingness to accept changes and new ideas.

example.ex: The conservatism of the literary establishment in this country is astounding...
example.tran: 这个国家文学界的因循守旧令人震惊。

example.ex: He began his professional life as an accountant, the very model of respectability and conservatism.
example.tran: 他开始了会计师的职业生涯，一份典型的体面而保守的工作。

means.word_mean: 1. a political or theological orientation advocating the preservation of the best in society and opposing radical changes
